description:
Mori, the man from the future, reveals his master plan to Karin, but she isn`t about to let him have his way! Meanwhile, Junta confronts his own descendent, come to visit him from the future. But she doesn`t seem to be on great grandfather`s side!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Quelque chose oublié 100 ans plus tard.
Un qualcosa lasciato 100 anni nel futuro
